officers.name: AJ Bamgbelu
officers.description: A.J. serves as our dedicated president, leading the organization with passion and vision. He brings valuable industry experience as a 2x intern at Meta.

officers.name: Tejas Kalpathi
officers.description: Hi guys my name is Tejas and I'm from Sugar Land, Texas. In my free time I enjoy playing tennis, pickleball, and watching football.

officers.name: Aarya Patel
officers.description: I'm the internal vice president and summer intern at HEB. I play cello, roblox, and sudoku.

officers.name: Obinna Nwakwue
officers.description: Obinna leads our Workshops team and helps organize educational sessions for the club.

officers.name: Sophia Phu
officers.description: Sophia enjoys programming, project management, and ACC. Out of ACC she is also president of the ENGR TAO organization, a TA for CSCE 120, and a violinist in the TAMU Chamber Orchestra.

officers.name: Caiti McInerny
officers.description: Caiti is an events officer from Chicago and has two dogs.

officers.name: Adam Mackintosh
officers.description: Adam is one of our Marketing Officers and a Meme master. He enjoys all things music. When he's not coding or making memes he's out adventuring or playing video games.

officers.name: Aniket Shirodkar
officers.description: Aniket is a workshops officer and enjoys running and playing tennis.

officers.name: Jagan Palanikumar
officers.description: Jagan helps create and deliver engaging workshops for our members.

officers.name: Adam Ryu
officers.description: Adam contributes to planning and running our workshop series.

officers.name: Lance Kakkassery
officers.description: Lance works with our project teams to help bring ideas to life.

officers.name: Brandon Yuan
officers.description: Brandon supports our project initiatives and helps coordinate development efforts.

officers.name: Thomas Ducote
officers.description: Thomas assists in managing and organizing our club's project portfolio.

officers.name: Ryan Rosario
officers.description: Hi, I'm Ryan! I'm one of our events officers and a software engineer intern at Chevron!

officers.name: Sanjana Ram
officers.description: I'm one of the events officers, I'm from Austin, and while I'm not coding I love painting and playing table top games with friends

officers.name: Ray You
officers.description: Ray is a marketing officer who loves tennis and art.

officers.name: Lanxi Xu
officers.description: Lanxi focuses on Art and Graphics for our Events and Marketing team, creating visual content for the club.

former.name: Jad Khalili
former.description: Hi, I'm Jad! I joined ACC in Fall 2021 as a freshman, later becoming a Workshops Officer during my sophomore year. Outside of school and ACC, I love to play basketball, soccer, and scuba dive. I can't wait to help share the world of coding with y'all!

former.name: Ezra Jeter
former.description: big coding guy. black honey tea with tapioca enthusiast. 6ft tall

former.name: Christion Bradley
former.description: Christion is one of our wonderful projects officers and a summer graphics software engineering intern with Intel!

former.name: Andrew Beketov
former.description: Besides coding, I enjoy going out with friends, playings sports, and cooking. I also have a funny cat named Mickey!

former.name: Yuqian Cao
former.description: Yuqian is one of our wonderful projects officers and a VR Research Assistant Intern at the Software Interaction Lab at Texas A&M!

former.name: Harsh Gangaramani
former.description: Harsh  is one of our wonderful projects officers and a summer software engineering intern with American Airlines!

former.name: Carlos Acosta
former.description: Carlos is one of our wonderful events and marketing officers officers!

former.name: Warren Wu
former.description: Warren (aka the goat) is one of our wonderful workshops officers!

former.name: Andrew Mao
former.description: Andrew is one of our wonderful workshops officers and a summer software engineering intern with Publicis Sapient this summer in New York City!

former.name: Carol Geng
former.description: Carol is one of our wonderful events and marketing officers and a Software Engineering Intern with J.P. Morgan Chase this summer!

former.name: Colin Levine
former.description: Colin is a marketing officer from San Antonio and a summer Explore Intern at Microsoft.

former.name: Sofia Ortega
former.description: Sofia is a former Workshops Chair and loves all things programming, especially servers. When she isn't working or programming, she is most likely playing Wizard101, Overwatch, or Spelunky.

former.name: Brady Langdale
former.description: Brady is a former Projects Officer. During his free time, Brady enjoys doing game and app development. When he's not busy programming, he likes to play the guitar and watch Mr. Robot.

former.name: Casey Pei
former.description: Casey is a sophomore Computer Science major with a Stats minor who only occasionally refers to herself in the third person. She enjoys digital drawing, typing tests, and scrolling endlessly on twitter.

former.name: Ryan Kabir
former.description: Ryan is one of our wonderful events and marketing officers and is pursuing software engineering internships this summer!

former.name: Dakshika Srivastava
former.description: Dakshika is our beloved former president, who loves writing and playing the keyboard. In her free time, you can find her cooking or watching Netflix!

former.name: Rebekah Garcia
former.description: Rebekah is our beloved former events chair. In her free time she enjoys road trips, watching movies, and reading. She will be a Financial Analyst at CBRE after graduation!

former.name: Pranav Jain
former.description: Pranav is one of our beloved former workshops officers. He will be attending Columbia as a Masters student after graduation!

former.name: Andrew Fennell
former.description: Andrew is interested in software development. His other interests include coffee, photography, and chess. He is now currently a Performance Engineer at arm!

former.name: Jay De Vera
former.description: Jay is a Pyschology major with a CS minor. In her free time she trains service dogs and rock climbs! She is now a Campus Ambassador for Bartleby!

former.name: Nathan Nguyen
former.description: Nathan is a big fan of safe, robust systems software. He's typically experimenting with new baking recipes, reading a good book, or consuming an unholy amount of spicy ramen.

former.name: Anthony Teo
former.description: When Anthony is not coding, he enjoys hiking, playing soccer, and watching Formula 1. He is now pursuing a Masters in HCI at Carnegie Mellon University and interning at Palantir!

former.name: Yonathan Zetune
former.description: Yonathan is a mobile development aficionado. In his free time he enjoys watching the TechLead or The Good Place and listens to jazz, otherwise known as elevator music, when he can. He is now a Software Engineer at Google!

former.name: Ryan Hall
former.description: Ryan enjoys cybersecurity, working with APIs, and teaching others new things. He is a certified caffeine addict, enjoys playing tabletop board games,  and always pours his milk before his cereal. He is now a Security Engineer at Google!

former.name: Alsten Okpisz
former.description: Alsten enjoys front-end web development and running Dungeons and Dragons games for friends. He is now a Software Developer at Paycom!

former.name: Gannon Prudhomme
former.description: When Gannon is not programming, he likes to play video games, play basketball, and watch film! He is now a Software Engineer II at Amazon working on iOS development for eero!

former.name: Tony Zhu
former.description: Lover of ultimate frisbee. movies and sleeping. Fun fact: traveled over 33,000 miles last summer. Not so fun fact: threw up while skydiving in Hawaii. He is now a Software Engineer at Amazon!

former.name: Shrey Shah
former.description: Shrey loves to code in Python and is extremely interested in Machine Learning and Cloud Computing. He is also a magician and has performed in stage shows and street magic. He is now a Software Engineer at Software.com!

former.name: Anikait Sharma
former.description: Anikait has a keen interest in HCI on how we can use technology to increase accessibility for all users. If Anikait was not at Zach procrastinating on his code - heâ€™s probably climbing some rocks, cooking some grub, or concert hopping with his homies!

former.name: Hannah Gooden
former.description: Hannah earned two minors in astrophysics and cybersecurity. She loves traveling, and spent a whole summer in New Mexico, where she crewed for a hot air balloon team on her weekends. She is now at the Johns Hopkins University APL!

former.name: Marissa Soria
former.description: Marissa has a special interest in cyber security and hardware integration and in her free time enjoys baking and gardening. She is now a Senior Consultant at Booz Allen Hamilton!

former.name: Feras Khemakhem
former.description: Feras completed his Masters in Computer Science in 2022 at A&M working on Computer Graphics and Animation the field. Personal hobbies include traveling to eat good food, and gaming. He is now a Software Engineer at Microsoft!

former.name: Mitchell Eldridge
former.description: Mitchell is interested in cyber security, machine learning, and teaching. With his free time, he enjoys rock climbing and hiking. He is now a Consultant at Pariveda Solutions!

former.name: Thomas McDonald
former.description: Thomas has experience in several industries and loves to work with people to meet objectives. Outside of school and work, he enjoys rock climbing and spending time with family and friends. He is now a Full-Stack Software Engineer at Stride!

former.name: Edgar Martinez
former.description: Edgar enjoys learning from others and helping others learn. It is likely that he has had more tacos than any other member in the Aggie Coding Club. Edgar is now at the Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory!

former.name: Gabriel Britain
former.description: When Gabriel isn't organizing hackathons or reading papers for his research, you can find him whipping something up in the kitchen, or 30 feet underwater scuba diving! Gabriel is now a Software Engineer at Microsoft!

former.name: Rohit Mucherla
former.description: Rohit is the former president of Aggie Coding Club! He is now a Software Developer at General Motors!

former.name: Michael McKenna
former.description: Michael co-founded ACC in 2015! He graduated working at Capital One and is now at Meta.
